import React, { Component, useState, useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import { getSiteImages, metaTags, getServerImage, getServerVideo } from "../../helpers/api"; import CaseStudies from './home/case-studies'; import FAQ from './home/faq'; import Services from './home/services'; export default function Home(props) { // console.log(props); function showVideoPopup(video) { setState({ ...state, video: video, videoPopup: true }); } const [state, setState] = useState({ videoPopup: false, video: null }); function closePopup() { setState({ ...state, video: null, videoPopup: false }); } // if (loading === false) return
; return (
{metaTags(props.content.metatags)}

: "" }
) }
